mapper.select: select a.process_name ,a.process_id ,b.process_id as careerprocess_id from bm004_process a left join bt006_careerprocess b on b.employee_id = #{employee_id} and b.certification_no = cast(#{certification_no} as integer) and a.process_id = b.process_id order by a.disp_order ,a.process_name
